sentences.en: After a South African newspaper first reported the love child last week, a public furor followed.
sentences.cn: 在南非一家报纸上周首先报导了祖马有这名非婚生子女的消息后, 公众的愤怒情绪随之爆发.

sentences.en: AIG furor puts spotlight on retention bonuses.
sentences.cn: AIG盛怒把聚光灯放在留任奖金上.

sentences.en: All this furor over a book?
sentences.cn: 勃然大怒竟是为了一本书?

sentences.en: Furor: This talent now works correctly with Cat Form again.
sentences.cn: 狂热: 这个天赋将在猫形态下生效.

sentences.en: His choice of words created quite a furor.
sentences.cn: 他的措辞引起了相当大的轰动.

sentences.en: Jackson surrendered himself to police a media furor.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊向警方自首因媒体轰动.

sentences.en: What is all the furor of new implicated in breast cancer risk?
sentences.cn: 这些新基因在了解乳腺癌发病风险方面有什么意义 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 激烈的；狂怒的；热烈兴奋的；喧闹的
勃然大怒；公众的骚动；狂热
